function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of collaboration with non-health sectors in vector control","Impact":"Reduced resilience against vector-borne diseases and decreased sustainability of vector control","Mitigation":"Engage non-health sectors for greater collaboration and resilience, and increase sustainability of vector control","Technologies":"Collaborative platforms, communication tools, and community engagement strategies","People":"Health sector, non-health sectors (e.g., private sector, housing sector, farmers)","Owner":"Vector control community, health organizations, public-private partnerships"},{"Description":"Inadequate development and testing of novel vector control tools","Impact":"Risk of relying solely on existing interventions, leading to decreased effectiveness in controlling vector-borne diseases","Mitigation":"Invest in the development and testing of innovative vector control tools, leveraging both insecticide and noninsecticidal approaches","Technologies":"Research and development in vector control, testing facilities, community-based trials","People":"Vector control community, research and development organizations, public health agencies","Owner":"Vector control community, research and development organizations"},{"Description":"Emergence of insecticide resistance in Anopheles and Aedes vectors","Impact":"Undermining the effectiveness of existing vector control measures and increasing the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement integrated vector management strategies, including noninsecticidal tools, and monitor and address insecticide resistance","Technologies":"Integrated vector management tools, insecticide resistance monitoring systems, alternative noninsecticidal interventions","People":"Vector control community, public health agencies, research and development organizations","Owner":"Vector control community, public health agencies"}]}
